official_title: A bill to provide the President with greater control over the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Reserve Act to make the terms of the members of the Federal Reserve Board concurrent with the term of the President who appoints them. Authorizes the President to remove a member for cause. Abolishes the Federal Open Market Committee.
